website_summaries.verdict: Provides a fun and challenging workout that doesn't require a lot of space.
pros: Features a soft ball that doesn't hurt if it hits you
Mastering the reflex ball takes skill and practice but can be done just about anywhere
cons: The Velcro on the adjustable headband isn't great quality, and the elastic string can fray after some use

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Inspired to buy it because I saw a demonstration of Vasyl Lomachenko use a tool similar to this one (not exactly this one) on youtube. This is my 3rd day with it and have already modified it to make it shorter. which makes it alot more challenging than its default length. I highly recommend this tool to supplement with your workout routine. It is very addicting. I only wish the line/string was more durable, as it has already started to fray at the end of the line close to the ball after only 3 days of consistent moderate to intense usage.
customer_reviews.author: houler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing training tool!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars but it keeps whipping me in my eye. I actually box and I can tell you this thing has drastically improved the accuracy of my punches. With plenty of practice you'll soon be able to punch this thing like you would a pad or reflex pad. If you can accurately control this ball with punches from a boxing stance you'll see pin point accuracy manifest in your performance. Highly recommended! Here's a gif of me at day two
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Saviano

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old grandson loved this. He was here when I received the ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grandson loved this. He was here when I received the package and he played with it the whole weekend. He asked me to get him one to take to his house. He used it to work on his eye-hand coordination although he did not know he was doing it. It was challenging for him but he loved it. I imagine an older adult would gain more from working with it but it still served a purpose with him.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gittemeier

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: Cable snapped and whipped me in the face. Use with protective glasses.
customer_reviews.author: MJbarhopper

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks silly, but it is so fun! My kids even kept wanting to take turns with it! I can't even get it out without them begging to have a turn. At first I wasn't sure how it worked, but I quickly learned that you strap it around your forehead and punch the ball. If you're not quick enough, it might "punch" YOU in the face too! It's fun to test your reflexes and get a short workout in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Despain

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great idea!! My 7 year old son is loving this box a ball! . It works great to bounce the ball on the ground or out in front of you. The ball is just the right size and is soft enough to not hurt you when you miss it! I bought this for my son to work on his reflexes to improve his hand and eye coordination for sports. We have had a few good laughs out of it.
customer_reviews.author: william mclglaun

customer_reviews.title: great training tool but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: this product is excellent for improving reflex and reaction time. the bungie string attached to ball and headband is super cheap. it breaks in a few weeks. i have brought three from this company snd the string broken within a few weeks. it is worth the money though.. maybe other companies have better quality strings...
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great FUN! hand to eye benefits and more.....!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is so much fun. it improves hand to eye coordination. Kids should be doing this instead of video games. I am enjoying it more and more as my skill level increases. Excellent! I intend to buy another for my car so I can box in the park.
customer_reviews.author: ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: Increased My Timing, Speed, and Agility
customer_reviews.text: This ball has help me to increase my speed and agility. It has also improved my footwork alone with my hand and eye coordination. It's soft enough that there's no need of fear of getting hit. It's a great tool for boxers and workout geeks.
customer_reviews.author: People R Saying

customer_reviews.title: Much harder than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It takes some persistence to get the hang of it but I like the workout and know this is great for eye hand coordination but it's anything but easy.
customer_reviews.author: AlanS

customer_reviews.title: Fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but there’s a fatal flaw: The square rubber piece that attaches the string to the headband has a small hole that houses the string. constant friction between the string and rubber square piece wear out the string, eventually severing it. Recommend going with Eivna Fitness model
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Fun tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun tool. The ball is fairly soft, I've hit myself in the face a lot (eyes, nose, mouth) and it doesn't bother me. Helps me realize my flaws with my coordination and punching accuracy/control. I highly suggest this even if you're not a fighter
customer_reviews.author: Raynard

customer_reviews.title: From a non-experienced user.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Quality is excellent and will not fall apart. I spent 3 days on this and mastered it. I have no experience in boxing or boxing training.
customer_reviews.author: yellowmelloboy

customer_reviews.title: As cheaply made as party favors
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the box and saw this “Boxing Reflex Ball”, I put it right back in the box to return it. It is a joke and my 8yr old could make one of these. The elastic string that holds the ball is the same cheap stuff used to hold a paper party hat under your chin. Nope, not even close to being worth what I paid. These are like cheap party favors kids get from birthday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tool!
customer_reviews.text: It may look silly, but this thing is great! You can get a good workout from it and it's easily incorporated into your routine. It helps with reflexes as well. It's also very portable so it's a good workout tool to bring with you on a trip. Both my husband and I enjoy it. I'm glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.

customer_reviews.title: Okaay
customer_reviews.text: Seems pricey for what u get. This could easily be made by getting a few items from a dollar store but if money isn’t a issue and your not crafty then it’s good
customer_reviews.author: CUTLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well until the 3rd week or so. ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well until the 3rd week or so. String is broken. Very thin string. At this price, I had hoped for a higher quality product. I did not hit too hard, I just used it quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Tristao Delince

customer_reviews.title: Returned. It came in broken. Addendum increased from ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned. It came in broken. Addendum increased from 1 to 4 stars. They sent a new one (unrequested). It works well, it's more forgiving than the ones with tennis balls attached to them. Has a lot of bounce since it is lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Fun Workout
customer_reviews.text: I saw a video of boxer Vasyl Lomachenko training with something like this and thought it looked like fun - and it is! Works your reflexes/timing and before you even realize it you've gotten some good exercise. The headband is also much more comfortable than I thought it would be. Although the first one they sent me only made it a few days before the string snapped, they were extremely responsive and sent a new one out right away no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY!!
customer_reviews.text: I guess it takes A LOT of practice to get good at this. I am having a hard time, but I'll keep at it. Good exercise and good for hand/eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: 1lostyankee

customer_reviews.title: my kids and just love it. i hang it on the ceiling and ...
customer_reviews.text: my kids and just love it. i hang it on the ceiling and we called a stress ball. we work on reaction and just for fun. it is hard to teach daughters to protect themselves, at least they could learn to hit hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: Cool product. I use occasionally when I bored. Watch out for the string. Sometimes it snaps back at your forehead.
customer_reviews.author: allaboutfitness

customer_reviews.title: String will break and snap into your eye
customer_reviews.text: It was fun while it lasted. String broke and snapped back into my eye. Thought I was going to lose sight in my right eye. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty crude
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple/cheap device that seems a little dangerous. I would think that it could bop somebody in the eye pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: omniverous reader

customer_reviews.title: Fun and VERY HELPFUL for sports.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a black belt in two martial arts, my other son in a soccer player and my sons friend is a hockey goalie. this product has helped all of their reaction times and improved their sports!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great for eye/ hand coordination
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old grandson and he loves it! Great for eye/ hand coordination! Added bonus it gets him away from playing video games or watching YouTube all day!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is fun for my son who thought it was a hilarious ...
customer_reviews.text: LOL!! OBVIOUSLY This will injure you when playing with a BALL ATTACHED TO YOUR HEAD! Think about it. It is fun for my son who thought it was a hilarious toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids & husband love this thing! What simple toy, and it improves coordination & reaction time!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: My head has never been battered like this before!
customer_reviews.text: I tell you what... my neck is getting plenty of exercise dodging the ball. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but quality is not here: rubber string broke after two weeks of light use...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Is good
customer_reviews.text: I little bit difficult to handle because the cable is long but that is to train my and increase my habilites and technique.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun and simple...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used it a few times but I’m happy with it. It’s fun and I feel that if I keep training It will definitely improve my accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: If you FOCUS you can work it like the ad!!
customer_reviews.text: I see where it says "Hand-Eye Coordination" but I would also say FOCUS. If you track the ball with your eyes you can easily get this. Ive had it a week and my personal record so far is 48 times both hands, 31 on my right hand solo, 38 on my left hand solo. It is not easy but it is fun and it works.
customer_reviews.author: joshua pittman

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, good game exercise when you’re stuck inside, very durable as well
customer_reviews.author: chris mcclain

customer_reviews.title: its good for relaxation
customer_reviews.text: oh boy, its good for relaxation. Kids love it as well. good for improving eye coordination as well.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my focus and speed - new boxer.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical to use this. I mean it's a ball attached to your head. I've started boxing classes a few months back and use this to help my focus and speed. It's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Best quality out there
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save money by purchasing the other brands and returned all of them. Spend the extra money and grab this one, it's MUCH higher quality. This is a fun training companion that can help with speed and focus.
customer_reviews.author: CoachChrisLA

customer_reviews.title: Watch for defective sewing on the headband.
customer_reviews.text: It is not built real good! After just a few minutes the threads started to let go from the headband. Good thing my little woman is very good with a needle and thread, she repaired it better then new. It does take a while to get use to the devise, and the little bungee whips you in the face when it recoils.
customer_reviews.author: Darron Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Its fun
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to play with. Good practice with hand eye control and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but buy eye protection. It will eventually smack you in the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Sunpulp

customer_reviews.title: OMG is this thing fun. It does suck that you can't take the ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG is this thing fun. It does suck that you can't take the elastic off the band but the fun level outweighed this design flaw. Don't hesitate, just buy it
customer_reviews.author: Brant

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. The elastic string broke immediately. We tied it together and the elastic string pulled away from the ball. It's too bad because he was really good at it, I, on the other hand, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F.

customer_reviews.title: pretty neat little contraption
customer_reviews.text: pretty neat little contraption. not a lot to it. i like the velcro, its not uncomfortable at all and it seems like a pretty cool item. i love it so far. plus, the price isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I was so satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item I was hesitant due to the price but once it had came in, I was so satisfied with my purchase! Whether you're training for boxing or just want to improve your speed and hand eye coordination then this is definitely worth buying. Very fun and addicting but watch out because the ball hits you right back if you miss your punch haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun product! My husband & kids had a really ...
customer_reviews.text: Really fun product! My husband & kids had a really time with it. It takes some work to get your coordination to work but this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: DragonMaddie08

customer_reviews.title: Sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I had another one prior to purchasing this one which ended up wrapped around my jump rope by accident & I had to cut it off. This is a replacement but it's shorter tho.Do they come in different sizes?!
customer_reviews.author: Rw

customer_reviews.title: Really good excersise.
customer_reviews.text: Use all the time, but after 4-6 month it starts tear apart to the point that you need to buy a new one but that’s normal. I go hardcore with it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cristhian Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY GRANDSON CAN'T STOP USING THIS HIS REACTION TIME IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product, would reccomend to anyone looking to improve ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product, would reccomend to anyone looking to improve hand eye coordination, also customer service was absolutely oustanding. Love everything about this product and the company. Wish I could give them 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for my 12 year old son. All of his friends want to try it. This will be the birthday gift we give all his buddies - for less than $20!
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great. But, tether not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. My only gripe is the lack of adjustability of the tether. I have fairly long arms for my height. However I still have had to wrap the tether around the head strap (a few times) to make it a good length.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Fun or Fitness
customer_reviews.text: This has been a big hit...no pun intended...with all our kids. We bought it for Christmas. It seems everyone has to try it.
customer_reviews.author: lprp8

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to laugh! This ball is a lot of fun but also challenging. Definitely will help with hand eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Misty McCall

customer_reviews.title: Super fun but the string broke and we can’t figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Super fun but the string broke and we can’t figure out how to get it back through ball to tie onto the opposite end.
customer_reviews.author: K. Graf

customer_reviews.title: mine broke after like 10 punches but i just put the broken part ...
customer_reviews.text: mine broke after like 10 punches but i just put the broken part of the string inside the velcro so it still works.. totally fun and hard at first but you get the hang of it. real fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money it’s ok. But watch that string
customer_reviews.text: The string popped out after a few uses. I’m just glad it didn’t snap back and pop me in the eye . The string needs to be a better quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will eventually break and hit you in the eye
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd and final purchase of this product. Great training tool but the string WILL eventually snap off and hit you right in the eye
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for not looking at the other reviews. Cheaply made toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: Better than a cheaper one I bought earlier this year.
customer_reviews.author: Bard Mills

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to get smacked in the face !! Lol
customer_reviews.text: A lot harder than it looks!! Still glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: C-Laz

customer_reviews.title: Challenge your friends who can get the most hits
customer_reviews.text: Cant stop wont stop! I love this!!! Its the greatest!! Challenge your friends to see who can get the most hits... so far i am winning... and it keeps me stress free. Truly amazing. Keeps me from drinking after a stressful day of work!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Dunaif

customer_reviews.title: but very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Ha. Kind of tough to get used too, but very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kam Fohey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I actually have a lot of fun making sure I hit my target EVERY TIME
customer_reviews.author: Aldean Harriott

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier. Yields results!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Wears comfortably with no irritation. My hand eye coordination improved significantly within just a couple weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great tool for boxing training and adds a new variation ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great tool for boxing training and adds a new variation in the gym! The Boxaball is great for hand eye coordination and reflexes! The Boxaball is a great tool for the competitive boxer and fitness boxer. Add something new to your Boxing workout with a Boxaball!
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Silly. And fun.
customer_reviews.text: Not really a work out. But hilarious and fun for my boys to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth.M

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a lesser quality ball from a different company which broke very quickly but the boxaball has remained durable and I can’t recommend the product highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Superb value ! I purchased a lesser quality ball from a different company which broke very quickly but the boxaball has remained durable and I can’t recommend the product highly enough !
customer_reviews.author: James quinn

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and love it so far. I'm glad the ball is soft so that I don't end up with a black eye. It looks like it takes a little bit to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin-Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Super cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Super fun gift. Received this as a gag gift but turned out to be a really cool thing. Had to purchase a slightly harder version
customer_reviews.author: Citizen Concerned

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe due to the way that the string is secured to the ball.
customer_reviews.text: This Box a ball just broke after 3 weeks of use. Super trash product. The stretch line busted while working out with it and hit me right in between the eyes. Had it hit my eyeball it could have been pretty serious.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great at first- but it didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: My son played with this for a very short time and loved it. Unfortunately, the string detached from the ball shortly after he received it. We are unable to fix it. We are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great product and surprisingly challenging!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! This was more challenging than I expected. I look forward to using it, and challenging my friends to use it. The product/materials appear durable.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: This is so much harder than you would think! Its still fun though!
customer_reviews.author: Panthro1

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced opt for similar at lower price
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for similar. Look it’s just a ball string and band. I use it love it but after few uses the elastic band becomes stretched for similar at 5 dollars or 15 dollars opt for those I’ve owned several

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not very good. it takes practice but it is also way too soft
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad buy. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Lasted two weeks and about approx 30 punches . String came off head band , bad buy . 👎🏼

customer_reviews.title: Very addicting!
customer_reviews.text: Very addicting! Lost track of time because I was trying to see how long I could do it for

customer_reviews.title: I started Trainning Boxing and i think this is great for reflex and conditioning your fist to hit harder
customer_reviews.text: I started Trainning Boxing and i think this is great for reflex and conditioning your fist to hit harder. I would recomend this product. 🥊

customer_reviews.title: Cord will break easy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 30 minutes and the cord is already about to break

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The band broke in less than a month I only used it about 6 times.

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to play with, takes about a day or 2 to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Challenging!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and really challenging. I haven't been able to put this thing down. Its a great present for friends. Be patient at first as it is really hard ;)
customer_reviews.author: The General Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Used this for about two hours the day I received it, it's challenging, but incredibly fun and addictive. I never boxed a day in my life, but It will greatly help your hand eye coordination and reflexes. I went to use it the next day to find one of our cats chewed through the string. I contacted the company, got an immediate response, and they are sending a new one free of charge. Highly recommend you try this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P. Manley

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This item is vastly overpriced at $30. This should be sold in a dollar store. It is extremely difficult to master this item, and in many instances the ball fires back and hits the user in the eye. Very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Becker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Return it. One punsh to the ball and it fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: I love this product don't get me wrong
customer_reviews.text: Originally left 1 star, but the team who created this product reached out personally and gave me a great customer service experience as well as help with the issues I was having. Very satisfied, changed to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Walker

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write a bad review but tonight my husband almost lost an eye and we ended up in the ER. He says he enjoyed training with it though. I strongly suggest eye protection to those who purchase
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: No Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how to use it because there is no Velcro on the strap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love playing with this (supervised of course)! Fun different kind of contraption!

customer_reviews.title: Broke day 1
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first day.... was not being used heavily.... be careful of your face Incase it breaks because I got whipped pretty bad...

product_meta.title: boxaball The Original Boxing Reflex Ball Great for Training to Improve Reactions and Speed, Boxing Gym Equipment Super for Both Training and Fitness
product_meta.description:
BEWARE BOXABALL ARE THE ONLY SELLERS WHO SELL THE BRANDED PRODUCT 'BOXABALL' OTHER SELLERS ARE NOT LICENSED TO DO SO 

Looking to improve your boxing skills?



How about enhance your coordination, concentration and speed?



Maybe also looking for a way to get a nice workout in your day and stay in shape?



Whatever the case may be, we have exactly the equipment for you!



 Presenting Boxaball’s Boxing Reflex Ball: Punch Your Way To Greatness!



Even professional boxers have used Boxaball to take their game to the next level, increase their awareness and speed.



With an adjustable and comfortable headband, all you have to do is wrap it around your head and start punching the ball without letting it hit your face!



You can dictate the pace of the ball with the force you use to strike it but the art of BOXABALL is to maintain a rhythm but also counteracting the unpredictability of the ball with your reflexes/fast reaction. If you are new to this, start with slower and less intense punches to avoid hitting yourself in the face.



The more you train with it, the better you will become and eventually the results will be truly impressive!



 Get Fit While Having Fun!



Who said working out has to be boring and uninspired?



With Boxaball, you can strap the headband on, have fun and burn out your body within 15—20 minutes! Perfect for work breaks or school breaks or even for the beach and the park, this punching ball equipment will definitely burn a lot of calories and help you get fit!



 100% Risk-Free Purchase!



Knowing that Boxaball is covered with our FULL money-back guarantee, there is absolutely nothing holding you back from making it yours today and improving your concentration and punch accuracy!



 What Are You Still Waiting For?



 Scroll Up And Click ‘Add To Cart’ NOW!
feature_bullets: THE BEST WAY TO IMPROVE YOUR REACTION TIME & SPEED! – You don’t have to be a professional boxer to use Boxaball! It’s the perfect training equipment that will increase your agility, concentration and reflexes while providing an intense workout!

BURN CALORIES & RESHAPE YOUR BODY! – Lifting weights and long hours on the treadmill is not the only way to get fit! In fact, Boxaball might be even better and far more compelling. The unpredictability of the ball, coupled with the intensity of your punches will really burn out your arms, chest, shoulders and upper back, perfect for calorie burning and conditioning!

WORK OUT ANYWHERE! – Don’t have time for the gym? With this boxing reflex ball, you don’t have to! Train from home or even from work! It’s lightweight and portable, which means you can carry it virtually everywhere with you! No more excuses...simply adjust the headband and you’re ready for your daily workout!

SUITABLE FOR EVERYONE! – Man or woman, teenager or child...it doesn’t matter! Everyone can use Boxaball either for training purposes or for a fun game that will build your hand-eye coordination and it will nicely compliment your MMA, boxing or kickboxing training!

100% SATISFACTION OR YOUR MONEY BACK! – Boxaball is truly a professional piece of fitness equipment and we stand behind it 100%. After all, we use it ourselves all the time! That’s why we are proud to back it up with our 100% money back guarantee, in case you are not entirely satisfied with it!
